titles.title: COASTAL Act of 2011
Consumer Option for an Alternative System To Allocate Losses Act of 2011
Flood Insurance Reauthorization Act of 2011
A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to include a system for indeterminate loss insurance claims, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
